introduction.heading: Reuben Commons
introduction.text: The Reuben Commons supports the management, analysis and sharing of Reuben for the research community and aims to accelerate discovery and development of Reuben

buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: The Reuben Commons defines its data in a cool way.
buttons.label: Learn less

buttons.name: Explore Data
buttons.body: The Exploration Page gives you candy and donuts.
buttons.label: Explore data

buttons.name: Analyze Data
buttons.body: Analyze your selected cases using Casio calculators in our secure cloud environment
buttons.label: Run analysis

login.title: Reuben Commons
login.subTitle: search, compare, and ignore data
login.text: A centralized, cloud-based discovery portal that is super buzzword compliant impacting the brain.
login.contact: If you have any questions about access or the registration process, please contact
